sentences.en: Acres of newsprint have been devoted to the issue.
sentences.cn: 报纸大肆报道了这一问题.

sentences.en: Calcium carbonate fillers can reduce newsprint paper costs mills to maitain good sheet quality.
sentences.cn: 使用碳酸钙填料可以减少新闻纸的生产成本,而且获得较好的纸页特征.

sentences.en: China is the most dynamic, developing newsprint market in the world.
sentences.cn: 中国是世界上最具活力 、 发展最快的新闻纸市场.

sentences.en: If using the thin newsprint paper consumption, a paper only, an annual saving of 27 %.
sentences.cn: 若加上采用薄新闻纸所节省的用纸量, 仅纸张一项, 每年可节省用纸27%左右.

sentences.en: In the introduction a new production line, newsprint capacity is rapidly expanding, increased supply.
sentences.cn: 在引进新的生产线以后, 新闻纸产能迅速扩大, 供应增加.

sentences.en: It is only normal that there is newsprint production capacity expansion to meet this growing demand.
sentences.cn: 只有增加生产能力以满足这个增长的需求才是正常的.

sentences.en: Major producers: the mechanism of paper covered, silver paper platinum paper, newsprint various varieties complete.
sentences.cn: 主要生产: 机制覆膜金纸, 银纸,铝铂纸, 各种新闻纸品种齐全.

sentences.en: Newsprint prices, the cost of excessive deficits will be issued.
sentences.cn: 新闻纸价格上涨, 发行费用的亏空将更高.

sentences.en: Regarding potential imports, newsprint has actually become local industry, partly due to the high transportation cost.
sentences.cn: 对于潜在的进口, 新闻纸业实际已成为当地化产业, 一定程度是因为高运输成本.

sentences.en: Skyrocketing newsprint costs will be the major cause.
sentences.cn: 其中新闻印刷成本的飞涨是主要的原因.

sentences.en: The higher the smoothness of newsprint, fine restore locations, the better.
sentences.cn: 新闻纸的平滑度越高, 网点的精细还原越好.

sentences.en: The Wall Street Journal uses 220,000 metric tons of newsprint each year.
sentences.cn: 《华尔街日报》每年用去22万公吨新闻纸。

sentences.en: They get their hands covered in newsprint.
They struck a deal with their paper supplier, getting two years of newsprint on credit.
sentences.cn: 他们同纸张供应商达成协议，可赊购两年的新闻用纸。

sentences.en: Will newsprint not be available in a few years time, also magazines at the bookstall?
sentences.cn: 新闻纸将不能在数年之后, 又在书摊杂志?
